properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 130259Z APR
   BY M/V NPS SANCO STAR AND M/V OCEAN EUROPE
   TOWING 300 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-15.5S 040-03.9W, 22-21.5S 040-08.1W,
   22-23.2S 040-05.2W, 22-28.1S 040-08.6W,
   22-35.5S 039-56.4W, 22-26.1S 039-49.8W,
   22-22.7S 039-55.5W, 22-21.3S 039-54.5W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 718/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 130359Z APR.
